name: DefrostMeat
bt_task: The robot task is to defrost a piece of chicken. The behavior logic of a robot should be as follows. The chicken is currently frozen and stored inside an electric refrigerator. There is a empty bowl on the countertop and a water source available in the sink. The robot needs to retrieve the frozen chicken from the refrigerator, soak it inside the bowl which filled with water to defrost it. The goal is to defrost the chicken with water.

Move_to_refrigerator.description: The robot moves to the location of the refrigerator.

Open_refrigerator.description: The robot opens the refrigerator door with one gripper.

Close_refrigerator.description: The robot closes the refrigerator door with one gripper.

Retrieve_chicken.description: The robot extends one gripper into refrigerator, grasps the chicken, and brings it out.

Move_to_countertop.description: The robot moves to the location of the countertop.

Place_chicken_in_bowl.description: The robot places the frozen chicken that is held by robot gripper into the empty bowl on the countertop.

Pick_up_bowl.description: the robot grasps and lifts the bowl with its gripper.

Move_to_sink.description: The robot moves to the location of the sink.

Fill_bowl_with_water.description: The robot extends the bowl which contains chicken and is held by robot gripper, and fill it with water inside the sink.

Defrost_chicken.description: The robot waits and finally the frozen chicken is defrosted completely

condition_node.Is_near_refrigerator?: Check if the robot is positioned near the refrigerator. Require a distance less than the gripper contact range of the robot to be considered near.
condition_node.Refrigerator_door_open?: Check if the refrigerator door is open.
condition_node.Refrigerator_door_closed?: Check if the refrigerator door is closed.
condition_node.Chicken_in_gripper?: Check if the frozen chicken is in the robot's gripper.
condition_node.Is_near_countertop?: Check if the robot is positioned near the countertop. Require a distance less than the gripper contact range of the robot to be considered near.
condition_node.Chicken_in_bowl?: Check if the frozen chicken is placed in the bowl.
condition_node.Is_near_sink?: Check if the robot is positioned at the sink. Require a distance less than the gripper contact range of the robot to be considered near.
condition_node.Bowl_with_water?: Check if the bowl is filled with water.
condition_node.Chicken_is_not_Frozen?: Check if the chicken is not frozen.
condition_node.Bowl_in_gripper?: Check if the bowl is in the robot's gripper.
